DTrait.Name: Xenophobic
DTrait.Description: Xenophobic races are slow to trust and quick to take offense, but can make strong allies if treated well.

DTrait.Name: Honorable
DTrait.Description: Honorable races are generally trustworthy and can make staunch allies. Unprovoked hostility against Honorable races can make them very angry.

DTrait.Name: Cunning
DTrait.Description: Cunning races love diplomacy and espionage, and will use these tools frequently to achieve their ends.

DTrait.Name: Aggressive
DTrait.Description: Aggressive races respect power and loathe weakness. Do not let your guard down when facing an aggressive opponent.

DTrait.Name: Pacifist
DTrait.Description: Pacifist races are not interested in conquering the galaxy and are easy to befriend.

DTrait.Name: Ruthless
DTrait.Description: Ruthless races are unpredictable and aggressive.

ETrait.Name: Generalists
ETrait.Description: Generalist races take a balanced approach to the development of their empire

ETrait.Name: Industrialists
ETrait.Description: Industrialists prioritize the development of technologies and infrastructure that will increase their industrial capacity

ETrait.Name: Technologists
ETrait.Description: Technologists hunger for knowledge, and will prioritize the acquisition of new advancements in their diplomatic and industrial efforts

ETrait.Name: Militarists
ETrait.Description: Militarists focus their development efforts on the acquisition of new weapons technologies, and like to maintain a strong military at all times.

ETrait.Name: Expansionists
ETrait.Description: Expansionists above all else desire to acquire new planets and to increase their populations as rapidly as possible.
